thread.section_title: Theater Seat Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Theater Seat Store | www.theaterseatstore.com
thread.title: Paul Strassmaier
thread.title_full: Theater Seat Store reviewed by Paul Strassmaier

author: Paul Strassmaier
title: Paul Strassmaier
text: When delivered, one chair was missing the power cord. Ok, that's not a big deal, they'll send me the cord. Once I get the cord, the chair is totally not functional. Months later I'm still waiting for "approval from the manufacturer". Approve what again? You sold me a broken chair that didn't work from day 1....
